# Node modules (frontend & backend)
node_modules/

# Build output
build/
dist/

# Logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
pnpm-debug.log*

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# IDEs and editors
.vscode/
.idea/
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln

# Coverage reports
coverage/

# Optional: Ignore SQLite or local DB files
*.sqlite
*.db

# Optional: Ignore uploads/temp files
uploads/
temp/

userNotes
